string-array.name: permission_description
string-array.item:
Receive SMS & MMS
Needed to detect incoming messages and categorize them for better organization, filtering, and notifications.

Read SMS
Required to access and classify existing messages for expense tracking, banking alerts, and spam detection.

Receive MMS
Needed to detect incoming MMS messages, allowing the app to process and categorize media-based messages.

Read Contacts
Used to display sender names instead of just numbers, improving the user experience by associating SMS senders with known contacts.

Read External Storage
Needed to access message attachments such as receipts, invoices, or media shared via MMS.

Write External Storage
Required for saving message-related attachments if users choose to export or store them.

Post Notifications
Required to display SMS classification results and updates as notifications. This ensures users receive important alerts for transactions, spam, and promotional messages in real-time.
